attributes.action: No bus route going through carmel at all lots of families struggling
attributes.background: I want to fight for public service bus going through carmel as lots of families are struggling as there is lots of social housing but no bus routes at all

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local bus services are a matter for individual bus companies and local authoriites, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
